SEARCH
Package gw.cc.activity.entity

Interface ActivityView

All Known Subinterfaces:
ActivityDesktopView, ActivitySearchView, ActivityTeamView, ActivityUnassignedView, ActivityVacationView, ActivityWorkplanView
public interface ActivityView
ActivityView Displays activities efficiently; also base entity for all other activity views.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    canAssign()
    Returns a boolean indicating whether or not the given activity can be assigned.
    String
    getActivityAssignedUser()
    Returns the name of the user this activity is assigned to or the special display string "SYSTEM" if it is null.
    boolean
    isOverdue()
    Returns a boolean indicating whether or not the activity is overdue.

  • Method Details

    • isOverdue

      boolean isOverdue()
      Returns a boolean indicating whether or not the activity is overdue.
      Returns:
      true if the Activity is overdue, false otherwise

    • getActivityAssignedUser

      String getActivityAssignedUser()
      Returns the name of the user this activity is assigned to or the special display string "SYSTEM" if it is null.
      Returns:
      string representing the name of the user this Activity is assigned to

    • canAssign

      boolean canAssign()
      Returns a boolean indicating whether or not the given activity can be assigned. Returns true iff:

      • the activity is of type Approval
      • the activity is of status Open
      • the activity is not assigned to a queue
      the user has the "assignactivity" permission
      Returns:
      true if the given Activity can be assigned, false otherwise
